channel.title: Lithium-OS [498] [SERVER JUST OPENED-SOMEONE BUMP PLEASE!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/QJHlqNj.png[/img] Client Download ![url=http://uppit.com/37sykvuthyoa/Lithium-OS.jar]http://uppit.com/37sykvuthyoa/Lithium-OS.jar [/url] http://lithium-os.proboards.com/ http://lithium-os.proboards.com/ http://lithium-os.proboards.com/ http://lithium-os.proboards.com/ FORUMS : http://lithium-os.proboards.com/ Hey guys !
[b]ive been playing RSPS for 5 years. I DONT BELEIVE IN DRAGON CLAWS OR STATIUS.
EXP RATE IS 100x ![/b]
Altars and home Are are at [b]Edgeville[/b] ! Items will still be worked for [[b]SKILLERS[/b]],Such as Magic shortbows, Amulets(str,power,glory,fury). Barrows is 100% ! [b]And is great for money making ![/b] [b]Duel arena is working[/b] [b]The Wilderness is 100% working[/b] [b]Drop Rates have been improved[/b]
Over the last 2 months i have started developing a [b]OLDSKOOL[/b] [i]PKing Server[/i]. That also has an [b]economy ![/b] Some items are in the [i]Store at Edgeville[/i]
The wise old man teleports you around ! As seen in the Pictures below There are a couple of us online now the server is fresh its been out only 1 month !
We are very keen too [b]PK[/b] and [b]SKILLERS[/b] are [b]welcome ![/b][/center]
[center][url=http://uppit.com/37sykvuthyoa/Lithium-OS.jar]http://uppit.com/37sykvuthyoa/Lithium-OS.jar [/url][/center]

Hey guys !

[b]ive been playing RSPS for 5 years.
I DONT BELEIVE IN DRAGON CLAWS OR STATIUS.

EXP RATE IS 100x ![/b]

Altars and home Are are at Edgeville !
Items will still be worked for [SKILLERS],Such as Magic shortbows, Amulets(str,power,glory,fury).
Barrows is 100% ! And is great for money making !
Duel arena is working
The Wilderness is 100% working
Drop Rates have been improved

Over the last 2 months i have started developing a OLDSKOOL PKing Server.
That also has an economy ! Some items are in the Store at Edgeville

The wise old man teleports you around ! As seen in the Pictures below
There are a couple of us online now the server is fresh its been out only 1 month !

We are very keen too PK and SKILLERS are welcome ![/center]

[/center]
